name: Locker (sharin9an)
description:
You accidentally open the wrong locker and find creepy pictures of a girl. As cliché as this sounds, will you help her from being stalked?

A SHORT VISUAL NOVEL HORROR GAME MADE IN 48 HRS.

THERE ARE 6 ENDINGS AND AROUND 10 MINS OF GAME PLAY.

Also, there's sound so turn up your volume. But not too much.

Btw there's a 5 second delay when the choices come up - I don't know how to fix it. Just wait a bit until the option button's colour changes when your mouse hovers over it.

Lmk if there are any mistakes.

CREDITS

- ART BY ME

- SOUND: https://freesound.org/ (amholma, shelbyshark, kyles, Noedell, ShortRecord)

- FONTS: https://www.dafont.com/ (minami, pixelpoiiz)
